title: Dying Shortly: Volume One
description: "Dying Shortly Volume 1"... two zombie short stories from author Armand Rosamilia... "Annie Morgan", about a woman just trying to survive (and find the right man), and "Clothes Shopping" (a Darlene Bobich tale with her trying to find a suitable wardrobe... plus a five chapter preview of the "Dying Days" novella... 11,500+ words...
author: Armand Rosamilia
